articles.title: Ratings through the roof: NRL draws 4.5 million TV audience - NRL.COM
articles.description: Almost 4.5 million Australians tuned in to the NRL's return to our screens across round three, making for the fifth largest TV audience in a regular season weekend in NRL history.
articles.content:
